actions.text: On agreeing to the Horn, Kendra S. amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A026) offered by Ms. Horn, Kendra S..
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Horn, Kendra S. amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Ms. Horn, Kendra S..

description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to decrease and increase funding by $2.5 million for Byrne Justice Assistance Grants Memorial funding dedicated to training to improve police responses to people with developmental disabilities or mental illnesses.
purpose: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to decrease and increase funding by $2.5 million for Byrne Justice Assistance Grants Memorial funding dedicated to training to improve police responses to people with developmental disabilities or mental illnesses.
